title: Providing the Income of Wildlife Park Entrance Fees to Provincial Councils
decision_details: - on a proposal made by Hon. A.L.M. Athaullah, Minister of Local Government and Provincial Councils, Cabinet approval was granted to grant the total income collected as entrance fees to the Wildlife Parks, to the Ministry of Agrarian Services and Wildlife during the first two years so as to utilize such funds to develop and improve the infrastructure facilities of these parks and thereafter, to share at the rate of 50% of the income, by the Provincial Councils and the Ministry of Agrarian Services and Wildlife  with the view to increase the income of Provincial Councils as well.
